= Purpose =

This directory contains HTML-generation tests and tools to execute them.

== Usage ==

To simply generate HTML for all the test files:
# yank the `!vim ...` line below using `yy`
# enter the command line with `:`
# press `CTRL-R "` and `Enter`

{{{
!vim -n -u vimrc -c "exe 'VimwikiIndex' | exe 'VimwikiAll2HTML' | quit"
}}}

The generated files will be in `html` directory, which is the same level
as the `wiki` directory.


Alternatively:

Execute `python test.py`:
{{{
Converting wiki to html...
Testing...
Tests count: 20
Tests succeeded: 20
Tests failed: 0
Ok!
}}}


== Writing tests ==

A test is a set of 2 files with the same name (but not extension): wiki file
and corresponding html one. Wiki file should be placed into `wiki` and html
into `expected_html` directories.

For example:

=== wiki/bold.wiki ===
{{{
*bold*
}}}

=== expected_html/bold.html ===
{{{
<html>
<head>
<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css" />
<title>bold</title>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
</head>
<body>

<p>
<strong>bold</strong>
</p>

</body>
</html>
}}}
